# `@davidwells/prettier-config`

> My personal [Prettier](https://prettier.io) config.

## Usage

**Install**:

```bash
$ yarn add --dev @davidwells/prettier-config
```

**Edit `package.json`**:

```jsonc
{
  // ...
  "prettier": "@davidwells/prettier-config"
}
```

## Rules

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (CODE:src=./index.json) -->
<!-- The below code snippet is automatically added from ./index.json -->
```json
{
  "printWidth": 120,
  "singleQuote": true,
  "jsxSingleQuote": true,
  "trailingComma": "all",
  "jsxBracketSameLine": false,
  "parser": "babel",
  "semi": false
}
```
